text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Everyone, it's a training camp!!
......Um, what's up, Kaho?

I saw it! In the recent "Justice V",
the heroes were undergoing intense training!

They were all working hard during the training camp to learn
new special moves! Everyone was getting stronger and cooler!
So, I want to do a training camp with everyone too!

I agree!
Sounds like fun!

Yeah!
We can have lessons from morning till night, right?

Yes... Producer-sama...
I'm sure you'll be pleased too...

Thank you, everyone!
Juri-chan...

I-I don't mean I don't want to go or anything!
But if we're going to do it... where are we going?

Wait, let me look it up──
...Oh, hey, everyone! How about here!?

......
Staying overnight at school...
We can stay overnight at school!?

Yeah, it's a lodging service that uses an abandoned school!
...It seems we can even rent the whole place!

That settles it!
Let's consult with the Producer!

──Are we going to...
write a report...?

Yeah, as part of the office's PR activities, I wanted
to create an introduction article for everyone. So──

If everyone stays overnight and reports on it,
then it's okay! Let's have a great training camp!

Yay!
Thank you so much!
